title: Should i get Rek'sai?
body: I am looking for a jungler that can gank lanes and is very strong and jungling as well. Rek'sai seems like a strong option but I would like to know what is your thoughts and if you can recommend anyone else that would be very nice.

replies.body:
Almost every champion can jungle if you learn how to utulise them properly. But in terms of "meta" junglers, ones built for jungling,
Yes, Reksai is a very strong jungler right now and is a good choice if you want to learn a jungler.

It also depends on the play style you like. Right now, most people are playing tanks so junglers like {{champion:113}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:111}}{{champion:106}}  are popular.

You want a strong fighter and ganker. Yes, Reksai is great. {{champion:5}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:254}} are also pretty good choices.

Personally I'd suggest trying to wait for champions to go on Free To Play so you can give them a try before you buy them
I left out a few such as fiddlesticks, nocturne, shyvana and like way more
Xin Zhao, win now. Best jungler. But Rek'Sai is a fantastic pick, definitely buy and learn him. Very enjoyable!
